answerText: Toni Morrison [or Chloe ArdeliaWofford][10] The title character of this novel, perhaps Morrison's best known work, haunts her mother Sethe's house at 124 Bluestone Road after having been killed by Sethe while on the run from Schoolteacher's slave catchers.

question: Question: The Morgan and Fleetwood families reside in the all black town of Ruby in this author's novel Paradise. For 10 points each: [10] Name this author who told of Joe Trace's fatal shooting of his mistress, Dorcas, in her novel Jazz. In another of her works, the refusal of some marigolds to blossom is linked to the death of Pecola Breedlove's child.
